USERNAME.description: Optional: Username to use when replying with the conversion result (default: dorrars)

EMOJI.description: Optional: Emoji icon to use when replying with the conversion result (default: :moneybag:)

DEFAULT_CURRENCY.description: Optional: Default currency to convert to if no second currency is specified (default: DKK)

SLACK_TOKEN.description: Optional: Additional security step: Slack slash command token for verification that the request came from your Slack team

OPENEXCHANGERATES_APP_ID.description: Optional: Specify a different key for openexchangerates.org in case the already provided key has been revoked.
